content: hugo is very easy seamless top-down poncho there was a little mistake should be cast on 96 stitches 13 01 2013 there is one more mistake before the edge the number of stitches between cables should be divisible by 8 + 4 e g 25x8+4=204 16 01 2013 jest ju dost pny wzór po polsku 2 12 2014 since i got a lot of questions about the cables i rewrote that part cable a transfer one stitch to a cable needle and keep it in the back knit 1 knit the stitch from the cable needle transfer one stitch to a cable needle and keep it in front knit 1 knit the stitch from the cable needle cable b transfer one stitch to a cable needle and keep it in the back knit 1 knit the stitch from the cable needle transfer one stitch to a cable needle and keep it in front knit 1 knit the stitch from the cable needle knit 4 i hope it is clear now 19 03 2015 new version of the pattern with a few explanations is uploaded
